p: Due to the absence of any specified treatment for COVID-19, researchers are still searching for potential therapeutic agents and an effective line of treatment to contain the disease. The implementation of CP therapy against COVID-19 was checked based on its past trials and the successful treatment of several viral-mediated epidemics and pandemics [ 84]. To date, several studies have reported the efficacy of CP therapy in curing patients with SARS-CoV-2 infection [ 54, 85, 86].
